name: futboss
description: FutBoss - Fantasy Game de Futebol Mobile-First

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.railway:build: npm run build && cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm test" "cd backend && npm test"
